title: ICE using unboxed closure sugar for FnOnce

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Sorry if this is a duplicate, I couldn't find anything.

``` rust
#![feature(unboxed_closures,overloaded_calls)]

fn main() {
  let foo = 0i8;
  let bar = |:|{ foo };
}
```

---
